Articles.Content:
I have made some parts which form part of a jet pack capable of propelling a kerbanaut around the Mun.

This is still in early (really early) stages and I hope that someone could make some (better) textures for this pack.

Download Zip

How to make a Jet Pack.

Choose the Jet Pack command Module

Attach Parachute on top if you want to go back to kerbin

Next attach Fuel tank -- On the flat side of the fuel tank attach a Kerbal

Under the Fuel tank attach the Jet Pack RCS unit.

Make sure that the Ejection phase of the Kerbal is in the first stage before LAUNCHING!

Tip when flying. Turn on SAS and press Caps Lock for precision flying.

Credit to prefim for the Kerbanaut and Mini Parachute parts.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4578.0

Please credit the original author of the Kerbonaut model you have there (prefim)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4578.0
I foresee a necro of the original kerbal model post in thee near future.

Despite the fact that the files are no longer available, they would probably not work anyways with the current version of KSP.

Let the thread rest in peace. ;-)
